alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Niihau (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued December 12 at 2:34PM HST until December 14 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI... .A large, long-period northwest (310 degrees) swell will peak tonight and Wednesday, then gradually diminish and become more northerly. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Surf peaking at 18 to 22 feet along north facing shores, and 12 to 16 feet along west facing shores tonight and Wednesday. * WHERE...North and west facing shores of Niihau and Kauai. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out. Large breaking surf, significant shorebreak, and dangerous currents make entering the water very hazardous.
